itunes:title: 263 - Are You Missing These Crucial Clues to Your Next Breakthrough?
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza, Chris Graham
itunes:summary:
Do you feel like you’re following all the right advice, but still not getting anywhere?

Often this is because you’re missing one key part of the equation: TIME

Strategy is ALWAYS dependent on TIMING and understanding and reading the signs of the time you’re currently within is CRUCIAL to real creative breakthrough.

In this episode I chat with my good friend Chris Graham about how to integrate timing into your strategy by picking up on the crucial clues that are hidden right under your nose!

We dive deep into lots of tactical thinking, as well as look at my Creative Side Quest theories from many new angles.

THIS WAS A GREAT CHAT!
